TextLibrary.Text: Queen Titania
Our thanks to you and to all of Agaria. It has been difficult enough to stop the Orcs, but with the Undead now becoming bolder, we are stretched thin.
Our thanks to you and to all of Agaria. It has been difficult enough to stop the Orcs, but with the Undead now becoming bolder, we are stretched thin.
Our thanks to you and to all of Agaria. It has been difficult enough to stop the Orcs, but with the Undead now becoming bolder, we are stretched thin.
Our thanks to you and to all of Agaria. It has been difficult enough to stop the Orcs, but with the Undead now becoming bolder, we are stretched thin.
Agaria is also beset by these creatures, your Majesty. It was all Queen Gwendholyn could do to spare a single person.
Agaria is also beset by these creatures, your Majesty. It was all Queen Gwendholyn could do to spare a single person.
Agaria is also beset by these creatures, your Majesty. It was all Queen Gwendholyn could do to spare a single person.
Agaria is also beset by these creatures, your Majesty. It was all Queen Gwendholyn could do to spare a single person.
Then I am all the more in her debt... and yours.
Then I am all the more in her debt... and yours.
Then I am all the more in her debt... and yours.
Then I am all the more in her debt... and yours.
Also, I have a gift for you from Syrus Darkhunter - this Lichebane Charm. He suggests you use it to help keep the road into Silvermyr safe in future.
Also, I have a gift for you from Syrus Darkhunter - this Lichebane Charm. He suggests you use it to help keep the road into Silvermyr safe in future.
Also, I have a gift for you from Syrus Darkhunter - this Lichebane Charm. He suggests you use it to help keep the road into Silvermyr safe in future.
Also, I have a gift for you from Syrus Darkhunter - this Lichebane Charm. He suggests you use it to help keep the road into Silvermyr safe in future.
Give Syrus my thanks. He is welcome in my palace any time, though I know he finds this place unsettling.
Give Syrus my thanks. He is welcome in my palace any time, though I know he finds this place unsettling.
Give Syrus my thanks. He is welcome in my palace any time, though I know he finds this place unsettling.
Give Syrus my thanks. He is welcome in my palace any time, though I know he finds this place unsettling.
You mentioned Orcs... Did they, by chance, take prisoners?
You mentioned Orcs... Did they, by chance, take prisoners?
You mentioned Orcs... Did they, by chance, take prisoners?
You mentioned Orcs... Did they, by chance, take prisoners?
Indeed they did. Very odd behavior for Orcs. It is not something we have ever seen before.
Indeed they did. Very odd behavior for Orcs. It is not something we have ever seen before.
Indeed they did. Very odd behavior for Orcs. It is not something we have ever seen before.
Indeed they did. Very odd behavior for Orcs. It is not something we have ever seen before.
We have seen the same in Agaria. Do you think all of this is related? The Orcs and the Undead?
We have seen the same in Agaria. Do you think all of this is related? The Orcs and the Undead?
We have seen the same in Agaria. Do you think all of this is related? The Orcs and the Undead?
We have seen the same in Agaria. Do you think all of this is related? The Orcs and the Undead?
We believe so. If the Orcs were just looting and pillaging, as Orcs always do, then we would simply say they had seized upon an opportunity, having seen us weakened from the Undead attacks.
We believe so. If the Orcs were just looting and pillaging, as Orcs always do, then we would simply say they had seized upon an opportunity, having seen us weakened from the Undead attacks.
We believe so. If the Orcs were just looting and pillaging, as Orcs always do, then we would simply say they had seized upon an opportunity, having seen us weakened from the Undead attacks.
We believe so. If the Orcs were just looting and pillaging, as Orcs always do, then we would simply say they had seized upon an opportunity, having seen us weakened from the Undead attacks.
But the change in their behavior and the appearance of the Undead at precisely the same time? This is too much to be a coincidence.
But the change in their behavior and the appearance of the Undead at precisely the same time? This is too much to be a coincidence.
But the change in their behavior and the appearance of the Undead at precisely the same time? This is too much to be a coincidence.
But the change in their behavior and the appearance of the Undead at precisely the same time? This is too much to be a coincidence.
Thank you, your Majesty. I'll take this news back to Queen Gwendholyn. It could be useful.
